sentences: Justin Ritter (born September 28, 1987), known professionally as SwizZz, is an American rapper and songwriter.
section: N/A

sentences: He is best known for significantly collaborating with childhood friend Hopsin, and being signed to their record label Funk Volume, which was founded by Hopsin himself.

sentences: In 2009, Hopsin founded his own independent record label, Funk Volume, with Damien Ritter.

sentences: SwizZz, who is Damien Ritter's younger brother became the first artist to be signed to Funk Volume.

sentences: Throughout late 2012, SwizZz toured internationally with Hopsin, Dizzy Wright, Jarren Benton and DJ Hoppa on the Funk Volume 2012 Tour.

sentences: Their concert tour included 44 shows in 50 days, and was the subject of a documentary released on November 11, 2013.
section: == Musical career == | === 2012–2015: Touring with Funk Volume ===
